long.en:
VoxScribe - Audio to Text Tool

A powerful and easy-to-use audio-to-text tool that lets you easily convert speech into text.

Key Features:

âœ¨ Audio to Text Conversion

Supports transcription of various audio formats.

Real-time voice recognition.

Supports uploading local audio files.

High-precision speech recognition technology.

ğŸŒ Multilingual Support

Supports Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean recognition.

Intelligent language detection.

Accurate punctuation handling.

ğŸ¤– AI-Powered Smart Summarization

Automatically generates text summaries.

Extracts key information.

Intelligent segmentation processing.

ğŸ’¡ Convenient Features

One-click copy of transcription results.

Real-time audio preview.

Simple and intuitive user interface.

Supports long audio processing.

ğŸ”’ Privacy Protection

Local audio processing.

Does not save user audio.

Secure data transmission.

Applicable Scenarios:
ğŸ“ Meeting minutes
ğŸ“š Study notes
ğŸ¤ Interview transcription
ğŸ“¢ Speech organization
ğŸ¯ Subtitle creation

VoxScribe makes audio-to-text conversion simple and efficient, helping you improve your work and study productivity!

Note: Transcription service requires an internet connection.
